item.title: Report I-2024100067
item.description:
Report I-2024100067

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T09:15:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-23
  • City: DULLES
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: An FAs link was discovered missing just before departure. During flight after the initial beverage service. The link was found in the back of an oven while meals were being loaded for service. Link was removed safely from the oven using gloves then covered with water(had to be removed to soak as it was not reachable bottle and was not smoking or on fire). Link was allowed to cool in a water bath. The device was last placed in the BSO closet, where they keep Hazardous Materials. It's been tagged with the DG case number and is currently still there.
